text: “Mtumiki (amene) akukuwerengerani ndime za Allah zolongosola (choonadi ndi chonama) kuti awatulutse mu mdima ndi kuwaika ku dangalira amene wakhulupirira ndi kumachita zabwino. Ndipo amene akhulupirira Allah ndi kumachita zabwino, adzamlowetsa m’minda momwe mitsinje ikuyenda pansi pake; akakhala m’menemo muyaya. Ndithu Allah wamkonzera rizq (dalitso) labwino (Jannah)
